column4: Can anyone tell me why it would say '192.168.0.256: Unknown host' (192.168.0.256 being the static ip), 'failed to bring up eth0' after setting up a static ip in /etc/network/interfaces on a clean install of Ubuntu in VirtualBox(without X)?
that series of numbers is not a valid IP
did you get your address problem corrected?
yeah thanks for pointing that out, its been a long day :)
